org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lru
Class GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lru.GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy<K,V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheLruEvictionPolicyMBean
public class GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy<K,V>
extends Object
implements GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheLruEvictionPolicyMBean

Eviction policy based on Least Recently Used (LRU) algorithm. This implementation is very efficient since it is lock-free and does not create any additional table-like data structures. The LRU ordering information is maintained by attaching ordering metadata to cache entries.

Wiki & Forum:

GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy

public GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy(int max,
                                  boolean allowEmptyEntries)
Constructs LRU eviction policy with maximum size and specified flag whether to allow empty entries.

Parameters:
max - Maximum allowed size of cache before entry will start getting evicted.
allowEmptyEntries - If true, entries with null values will be evicted immediately.
